chapters.title: Chapter 27: The Bargain
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 532 (606)—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. Rand put him in charge of Cairhien along with Berelain. See also Amys; sur Paendrag Paeron, Berelain.
